title: 9/11 Retrospectives and the Desirous Spiritual Conflict We Participate In Every Day (sans WWE)
description:
WWE made a copyright claim on the wrestling sections of this video. This version omits that section to avoid a copyright strike. All the rest of the content is the same. 

With the 20th anniversary of 9/11 we're awash in retrospectives that immerse many of us in all the feelings of that day. What is going on? We are in the midst of spiritual conflicts but to simply imagine or reject them as purely other-worldly or supernatural is not paying attention to what we do and how we behave. 

 @Chris Williamson  interview with Luke Burgis https://youtu.be/72svGiOaKMk
Clips from "Hitman Hart: Wrestling with the Shadows" https://youtu.be/L3wZhA5s3kI
Everyone Losing Their Minds https://youtu.be/xuTKVqWRmCw
Tom Holland and Dominic Sandbrook The Rest is History 9/11 https://pca.st/jdl26sbr
The Godfather Opening Scene https://youtu.be/K6LKszIrDzo
Peter Boghossian Resignation Letter on Bari Weiss Substack https://bariweiss.substack.com/p/my-university-sacrificed-ideas-for
High on God High on God High on God https://amzn.to/38MCnF6
Sun Tzu Art of War https://amzn.to/38XdhDx
Aaron Rodgers Danica Patrick https://www.nickiswift.com/227408/the-real-reason-aaron-rodgers-and-danica-patrick-broke-up/
 @Jonathan Pageau  with  @Jordan B Peterson  Conversation https://youtu.be/2rAqVmZwqZM

Discord link. Good for just a few days. Check with more recent videos for a fresh link. https://discord.gg/feUJvabj
Vanderklips channel https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCX0jIcadtoxELSwehCh5QTg

My Substack https://paulvanderklay.substack.com/

If you want to schedule a one-on-one conversation check here. https://paulvanderklay.me/2019/08/06/converzations-with-pvk/

For the audio podcast mirror on Podbean http://paulvanderklay.podbean.com/

To listen to this on ITunes https://itunes.apple.com/us/podcast/paul-vanderklays-podcast/id1394314333 

If you need the RSS feed for your podcast player https://paulvanderklay.podbean.com/feed/ 

All Amazon links here are part of the Amazon Affiliate Program. Amazon pays a small commission at no additional cost to you if you buy through one of the product links here.

To support this channel/podcast with Ethereum (ETH): 0xd3F649C3403a4789466c246F32430036DADf6c62

Powerpoints of Monologue videos are available for Patrons at https://www.patreon.com/paulvanderklay

Also on Lbry: https://odysee.com/@paulvanderklay
